About

Álvaro Orellana is a Senior Software Engineer with several years of professional experience (10+). He has been working on challenging projects and startups worldwide for outsourcing companies and local/remote teams like programmer, full-stack developer, team lead, code skills trainer, consultant, code reviewer, manager and software architect.
